column1: #Text=I live in Quebec, worked in the Social Services..
#Text=I have seen how our Que daycare works.
#Text=All to often it is the ones who could pay more that end up using the daycare system.
#Text=They actually put their names onto a list for a spot in selected daycare, the minute the mother is expecting.
#Text=I have even heard of cases of parents who are planning a baby in next two years to get a name on a list.
#Text=Meanwhile those low income working moms and families have to wait years to have a spot in a daycare.
#Text=Why, because they are not as aware of 'how to work the system' as the others.
#Text=People put their kids in daycare, higher income families, sometimes for no other reason to have time to do what they want, they do NOT work..
#Text=The concept of daycare is good, but must be better monitored with perhaps slanting pay scale so that the ones for which the idea came to be, can benefit.
#Text=Not the middle classes who can pay more, but do not, and take up spaces that could be used by those who so need it..
